title: A Perfect Match Series
description: *** Enjoy all three of the A Perfect Match Series books: The Proposal, Lost In Solo and Heart Sync in one volume ***Sometimes, love finds you when you least expect it...The Proposal (Book 1)A high flying career woman finds herself drawn to a stripper she meets at her sister's bachelorette party.Things become complicated, however, when she hires him a few weeks later to pretend to be her boyfriend at a company event.Lost In Solo (Book 2) - The Prequel to The ProposalNadine Stefano is ambitious, driven and wants to climb the career ladder. She doesn't care for romance. Although she has yet to meet the younger, sexier and struggling artist who will soon turn her world upside down.Ethan Adams is that struggling young artist trying to make his life better but life has other plans.Heart Sync (Book 3) - The Sequel to The ProposalNadine and Ethan finally get together and it seems as though things are working out for them both. But will the differences between them and the choices they have to make threaten their happily ever after?
author: Lily Zante
